Pre-Game Insights: The Kansas City Royals won their last series against the Minnesota Twins 5-0, 4-2, and 2-0.
The New York Yankees won their last two games against the Chicago Cubs 3-0 and 2-0, but lost the third game 2-1.
Brady Singer will start for the Kansas City Royals with a 9-10 record and a 3.35 ERA.
Carlos Rodon will start for the New York Yankees with a 14-9 record and a 4.19 ERA.
Each of the Yankees' last five night games against American League opponents has gone OVER the total runs line.
Each of the Royals' last four games has gone UNDER the total run line.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Royals' last 10 games against American League opponents.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Yankees' last three home games.
